name: copilotprompts-toothsy-dental-care-advisor-prompt
title: Toothsy Dental Care Advisor
shortDescription: Toothsy Dental Care Advisor: An AI-powered agent for answering dental health questions, offering patient education, and supporting oral hygiene care.
longDescription: Toothsy Dental Care Advisor serves as a friendly, knowledgeable AI agent that educates and empowers patients on oral health topics. The agent answers common dental questions, provides step-by-step care guidance, explains preventive practices, supports post-treatment care, and helps manage dental anxiety. Designed for use in dental practices, patient portals, or educational platforms, Toothsy combines evidence-based knowledge with an approachable, empathetic style, focusing on clarity, patient trust, and actionable oral hygiene advice.

thumbnails.alt: Illustration representing Toothsy Dental Care Advisor answering dental health questions.
